REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f1022 reute b f BC-TURKISH-CENTRAL-BANK 04-01 0051

TEXT.TITLE: TURKISH CENTRAL BANK SETS LIRA/DOLLAR, DM RATES
TEXT.BODY: The Turkish Central Bank set a lira/dollar rate for April 2 of 780.00/783.90 to the dollar, down from the previous 777.00/780.89. The Bank also set a lira/mark rate of 429.15/431.30 to the mark, up from the previous 430.50/432.65. REUTER
